name: Pumpkindad
description:
Your friendly neighborhood Other Father.~

I've been away for quite a while, so here's a sketch to get used to things.

The selection tool updates are so helpful, and hull has completely eradicated my issue with making 3D shapes natively. 

Making shapes with hull is a bit tricky though, since you can't change the shape once you let go. A hall of mirrors could help here, as getting the right shape from every angle is a no go. Otherwise a smoothing tool might work, as the main issue is lining up the additions to avoid weird lighting.

It's definitely a lot easier to make things now, so I'm looking forward to getting back into it.
